definition[0]: used at the end of a question to show that you are impatient with someone or something
example[0]: Are you afraid of him, or what?
example[1]: Is that work going to be finished by Friday, or what?
definition[1]: used after mentioning one or more possibilities to show that you are not certain about something
example[2]: I donâ€™t know whether it was an accident or on purpose or what.
definition[2]: used after a description of someone or something to emphasize it
example[3]: Nearby are the remains of a deserted village. Spooky or what?
